Technologies
============


Here are the technologies and language using for this web app


Python: 3.11
Django: 3.2
Flake8: Linting tool
Pytest-django: Testing frmawork for Django apps
Pytest-cov: Coverage pluggin to mesure code coverage
Python-dotenv: Manage environment variables
Sentry-sdk: To track and logs the errors 
Six
Gunicorn: Server for run Python web app
Whitenoise: Used to collect static files
Sphinx: Documentation generator
